meanings.definition: Feel contempt or a deep repugnance for.
meanings.sent1: She despises the taste of broccoli.
meanings.sent2: He despises bullies who pick on others.
meanings.sent3: The cat despises the new brand of food, turning her nose up at it.
meanings.sent4: His heart despises the idea of giving up on his dreams.
meanings.sent5: The teacher despises cheating and always catches those who try.

meanings.sent1: The old man despises the noisy neighbors.
meanings.sent2: She despises the way he treats his employees.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel despises the bird for stealing its nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes despise the dishonesty in his words.
meanings.sent5: The artist despises mediocrity and strives for excellence in every piece.
